message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%. I'm hoping we can find a compromise that works for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more for my part in this deal. Let's see if you're willing to meet me halfway.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile for me. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned about the value of the money decreasing with inflation. I think we should split it evenly now, while we still can.
